name: Save File Analyzer
author: FF6 Editor Team
description: Comprehensive save file statistics dashboard showing completion percentages, character details, inventory analysis, and progress tracking across all game categories.
longDescription: A powerful read-only analysis tool that provides detailed insights into your save file. View overall completion percentage with weighted scoring, character statistics (levels, HP/MP, spells learned), party composition analysis, inventory metrics, and exportable progress reports. Perfect for completionists tracking their progress or comparing multiple playthroughs.
